name: EPIC BATTLES *Open Beta*
description: Epic Battle is a crossover fighting game Made with the MUGEN Engine and published by Deadshot Entertainment Interactive. It has all of the favorites Spongebob Squarepants. Goku, Jiren, and also Spiderman. in this beta you are given half of the characters that are in the game. Soon All Characters Will Be Playable And Story Mode and also Minigames!
